name: BloodTransfusion
title: Blood Transfusion
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts of procedures of blood transfusions.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to procedure.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent procedures of a blood transfusion.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
